str_ErrorCostOver: Total memory is need to keep under {0}.
str_WarnWriteDefaults:
WriteDefaults are not unified in the FX layer.
It will work as-is, but there may be a bug in switching facial expressions.
If the error message does not disappear after toggling the WriteDefaults checkbox, please check other avatar gimmicks you are using.
str_InfoOptimizeParameter:
Parameter optimization is disabled. 
If you want empty or duplicate parameters to be removed automatically, please use parameter optimization.
str_RISMessage:
Thank you very much for downloading the Radial Inventory System!
If you don't know how to use it, please try to use it after reading the instructions from the link below.
If you have any bugs or requests for additional features, please let us know via Twitter DM.
